<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Format a pointer value as hexadecimal. Zero pad it out so its always the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">/// same width.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="#a108a0e76fa3727c0c510ac557c778234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattednumber">FormattedNumber</a> <a href="#a108a0e76fa3727c0c510ac557c778234">format&#95;ptr</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each byte is two hex digits plus 2 for the 0x prefix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PtrWidth = 2 + 2 &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec">format&#95;hex</a>((uint64&#95;t)PC, PtrWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
